commandDescription: Auto-generate Apex classes from RAML definition files (for Mulesoft Anypoint)
flagPathDescription: URL or local file path for RAML definition file
flagOutputdirDescription: local folder for storing the created files
flagApiversionDescription: specify the API version (default to sfdx API version if not set)
errorNoJavaInstallation: A Java installation could not be found.
errorNoDevHubConnection: Could not connect to the DevHub for fetching the API version.
errorClassGeneration: An error occurred during class generation.
